titles.title: A bill for the relief of the Washington Welfare Association, Inc. of Washington, D.C., which operates the Southeast Neighborhood House.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 4/13/1988--Introduced. Relieves a named Washington, D.C., corporation and specified employees from all liability to the United States for the payment of employment taxes with respect to services performed in the employ of such corporation during a specified period.
